column5: You'll deepen your knowledge of marine engineering and understand how it can be applied. Our master's in Marine Engineering covers topics associated with:    ship propulsion machinery and transmission   ship performance   system reliability,   condition monitoring   electrical systems    Our MSc is designed for both practising professionals and new graduates in subjects such as:    civil engineering   mechanical engineering   naval architecture   offshore engineering   ocean engineering   marine engineering    This course meets the growing needs for engineers skilled in marine engineering. It highlights the cutting-edge technologies and provides an understanding of:

column9: 1-2 years Full time, 2 years Part time
